020package com.bewsoftware.utils.io;
021
022/**
023 * Exceptions interface description.
024 *
025 * @author <a href="mailto:bw.opensource@yahoo.com">Bradley Willcott</a>
026 *
027 * @since 1.0.7
028 * @version 1.0.7
029 */
030public interface Exceptions {
031
032    /**
033     * Clears all exceptions in preparation for an operation that may cause such to
034     * occur.
035     */
036    public void clearExceptions();
037
038    /**
039     * Checks to see if there is an Exception.
040     *
041     * @return {@code true} if so, {@code false} otherwise.
042     */
043    public boolean isException();
044
045    /**
046     * Retrieves the last Exception.
047     *
048     * @return the Exception
049     */
050    public Exception popException();
051}
